description: <p>We are seeing a highly motivated Band 5 Staff Nurse with, who is an efficient worker with strong clinical knowledge, excellent communication skills and the ability to work under pressure whilst remaining focused on safe good quality care. We are looking for someone, who is seeking a new personal challenge, to join our small friendly team. Maple Suite delivers nursing care to a wide variety of patients, The learning opportunities are vast due to the nature of our patients and the diversity of nursing care skills required. Although cardiothoracic experience is not essential, it would be advantageous. The post holder should have up to date knowledge of current issues within the NHS and changes and excellent communication skills. All applications are welcomed, and any further information required, please do not hesitate to contact Sandra Wilson - Ward Manager Email: sandra.wilson@lhch.nhs.uk or Phone: 0151 600 1386 or Lincy Abraham - Ward Sister at lincy.abraham@lhch.nhs.uk Phone 1051 600 1335 Informal visits to the ward are welcomed For further details / informal visits contact: Sandra Wilson Ward manager - Maple Suite 0151 600 1386</p>
